definition: Bruce Lee (1940-1973), Hong Kong actor and martial arts expert
plum
surname Li
small/tiny/few/young
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long

sentences.english: Ding Pei's in relation to Bruce's untimely death.
sentences.chinese: 究竟李小龙的猝死，跟丁佩可有任何关系？

sentences.english: I thought I could be the next Bruce Lee.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得自己能成为李小龙二。

sentences.english: With his lean body and perfect physique, who could do a better job of imitating Bruce Lee?
sentences.chinese: 以权相宇的完美身材，有谁能比他演的更像李小龙呢？

sentences.english: Today would have been Bruce Lee's 70th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 今天是功夫明星李小龙的70诞辰。

sentences.english: When I grew up, I always looked up to Bruce Lee.
sentences.chinese: 当我逐渐成长时，我一直很尊敬李小龙。

sentences.english: Get into his world and try to understand what Bruce Lee is about.
sentences.chinese: 进入他的世界，试着了解李小龙是什么。

sentences.english: It is Bruce Lee's an only personal monograph before death.
sentences.chinese: 这是李小龙死亡前唯一的个人专着。

sentences.english: Bruce Lee's two-inch punch is a famous example of this.
sentences.chinese: 李小龙的贴身发力功夫就是最好的例子。

sentences.english: Bashiok: Bruce Lee would not use a shield, and neither would the monk.
sentences.chinese: 李小龙不会使用一个的盾牌，武僧也不会。

sentences.english: This side of Bruce Lee is not working, he as usual act wildly.
sentences.chinese: 此方对李小龙则不灵，他照常撒野。

sentences.english: Bruce Lee KO Jackie Chan in "Enter the Dragon" (in slow motion).
sentences.chinese: “龙争虎斗”中李小龙击倒成龙的慢镜片段。

sentences.english: Bruce Lee really kicks-butt in his movies.
sentences.chinese: 李小龙在他的电影里真的很棒。

sentences.english: Interpreter and Tongji bridge engineering student Li Xiaolong. His name translates as 'Little Dragon'.
sentences.chinese: 同济大学桥梁专业学生，也是我们的翻译李小龙。

sentences.english: I want to build lean muscles just like Bruce Lee.
sentences.chinese: 我想练出像李小龙那样精实的肌肉。

definition: Jeet Kun Do or Way of the Intercepting Fist, a fusion of Eastern and Western martial arts led by Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]

Brandon Lee (1965-1993), American actor, son of Bruce Lee
acrobatic fighting in Chinese opera or dance
Chow Yun-Fat (1955-), Hong Kong TV and film star
Li Zhenfan (1940-1973), real name of the actor Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Stephen Chow (1962-), Hong Kong actor, comedian, screenwriter and film director, known for his mo lei tau 無厘頭|无厘头[wu2 li2 tou2] movies
action movie/kungfu movie
Leslie Cheung (1956-2003), Hong Kong singer and actor
Andy Lau (1961-), Hong Kong Cantopop singer and actor
